channel.title: Amount colours problem

item.title: Amount colours problem
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

I don’t want to change the million amount, I want to change the 1-100,000 to yellow, 100,000-1,000,000 to white, and 1,000,000 to green.

item.title: Amount colours problem
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

[code]private static final String method14(int i, int j) {
String s = String.valueOf(i);
for(int k = s.length() - 3; k > 0; k -= 3)
s = s.substring(0, k) + “,” + s.substring(k);

    if(j != 0)
        aBoolean1224 = !aBoolean1224;
    if(s.length() > 8)
        s = "@gre@" + s.substring(0, s.length() - 8) + " million @gre@(" + s + ")";
    else
    if(s.length() > 4)
        s = "@whil@" + s.substring(0, s.length() - 1) + "K @whi@(" + s + ")";
    else
    if(s.length() > 1)
        s = "@yel@" + s.substring(0, s.length() - 1) + "K @yel@(" + s + ")";
    return " " + s;
}[/code]

It compiles right but my 3 coins still remain green.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Razik-Blaze wrote:

Add this:

else if(s.length() > 1) s = "@yel@" + s.substring(0, s.length() - 1) + "K @yel@(" + s + ")"; return " " + s;

item.title: Amount colours problem
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

This code doesnt work, I have 2 coins and the amount is green.

Client.java

[code]private static final String method14(int i, int j) {
String s = String.valueOf(i);
for(int k = s.length() - 3; k > 0; k -= 3)
s = s.substring(0, k) + “,” + s.substring(k);

    if(j != 0)
        aBoolean1224 = !aBoolean1224;
    if(s.length() > 8)
        s = "@gre@" + s.substring(0, s.length() - 8) + " million @gre@(" + s + ")";
    else
    if(s.length() > 4)
        s = "@Whi@" + s.substring(0, s.length() - 4) + "K @whi@(" + s + ")";
    return " " + s;
}[/code]

Read full topic
